parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the policy. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Units: milliseconds.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the policy. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Units: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description:
The template of the policy. Valid values:

*   **promotion**: important activity
*   **bypass**: all traffic forwarded
